title: NFL WEEK 6: Our official predictions for who wins this weekend
text:
Week 5 of the NFL season was a wild one, with the Colts pulling off one of the most stunning upsets of the year and the Browns looking absolutely lost on national television.

This week, the Patriots and Giants kick off the action in New England on Thursday night, followed up by a full slate of games on Sunday.

Once again, we're picking every game of the week against the spread with the hopes of making a little money.

Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories.

Week 5 of the NFL season was a wild one.

The Kansas City Chiefs suffered their first loss of the season, scoring just 13 points against the Indianapolis Colts, the Raiders took down the Bears in London, and the Ravens outlasted the Steelers in an overtime thriller.

Despite all of the chaos, or perhaps because of it, our picks had a solid week, going 9-6 against the spread to move to a 55.1% hit rate on the season thus far. Not bad!

With Week 6 action fast approaching, we're once again picking every game on the schedule against the spread.

Take a look below at our best bets against the spread for Week 4 of the NFL season (* indicates home team).

LAST WEEK: 9-6

OVERALL: 43-35
description: This week we like the Philadelphia Eagles, Cleveland Browns, and Denver Broncos to cover the spread on Sunday.
